descmd: The changes in this STU update to Da Vinci CDEX include updates to be [US Core 6.1.0](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU6.1/) compatible and change requests submitted by the Da Vinci and HL7 community. The HL7 International Payer/Provider Information Exchange (PIE) work group members have agreed to and voted on the resolution of the community comments. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the [Change Notes](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU7/changes.html).
desc: The changes in this STU update to Da Vinci CDEX include updates with US Core 6.1.0 compatible and change requests submitted by the Da Vinci and HL7 community. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the Change Notes: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU7/changes.html.
